question: Identify the social media engagement trends of the companies in the technology sector over the last year.

subtasks.task: Retrieve a list of active technology companies from the CompanyInfo table, filtered by industry type.
Collect social media engagement data from social media tables (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube) for the identified technology companies over the last year.
Aggregate the collected social media engagement data to measure trends in likes, comments, and overall engagement rates per platform for each company.
Analyze the aggregated engagement data to identify any notable trends or patterns in social media interactions within the technology companies sector.
